Hymn.Arabic: في ذلك اليوم ينير الله بالمشورة والمجد على الأرض ليرتفع ويتمجد كل من يبقى من إسرائيل،
Hymn.English: In that day the Branch of the Lord shall be beautiful and glorious; And the fruit of the earth shall be excellent and appealing For those of Israel who have escaped.

Hymn.Arabic: ويكون كل من يبقى في صهيون، وبقية أورشليم يدعون أطهارًا. يكتب للحياة كل من في أورشليم لأن الرب يغسل أعمال بني البشر وأولاد صهيون.
Hymn.English: 3 And it shall come to pass that he who is left in Zion and remains in Jerusalem will be called holy—everyone who is recorded among the living in Jerusalem. 4 When the Lord has washed away the filth of the daughters of Zion, and purged the [a]blood of Jerusalem from her midst, by the spirit of judgment and by the spirit of burning,
